article_title: Facebook changes policy for profiles of deceased users
article_text:
Just One More Thing...

We have sent you a verification email. Please check your email and click on the link to activate your profile.

If you do not receive the verification message within a few minutes of signing up, please check your Spam or Junk folder.

Close

og.description: As if there weren’t already enough reasons to be careful about what you say on social media, Facebook is now leaving the profiles of deceased users exactly as they were when they were alive.
og.title: Facebook changes policy for profiles of deceased users
